医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Health Services Laboratories 通过与 Automata 合作加快 NHS 病理学服务的周转时间截至 2023 年夏季，以创新为主导的病理学和诊断服务提供商 Health Services Laboratories 与生命科学自动化公司 Automata Technologies 合作，以加快病理学和诊断服务的周转时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Health-Services-Laboratories-unlocks-faster-turnaround-times-for-NHS-pathology-services-by-collaborating-with-Automata.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Health-Services-Laboratories-unlocks-faster-turnaround-times-for-NHS-pathology-services-by-collaborating-with-Automata.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6bc577f-9ea7-43e4-b7d0-37d187e477d5 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 03:16:00 -0400 Health Services Laboratories unlocks faster turnaround times for NHS pathology services by collaborating with Automata
Automata Technologies 任命健康和生命科学行业高级高管顾问委员会Automata Technologies 是一家为生命科学实验室自动化提供支持的领先自动化公司，该公司已任命了首个顾问委员会，该委员会由全球医疗保健和生命科学行业的高级管理人员组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Automata-Technologies-appoints-advisory-board-of-senior-health-and-life-sciences-industry-executives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Automata-Technologies-appoints-advisory-board-of-senior-health-and-life-sciences-industry-executives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5996b4e0-d6af-4cb4-9cd4-a191563ce5cb Fri, 06 Sep 2024 03:14:00 -0400 Automata Technologies appoints advisory board of senior health and life sciences industry executives
英国首个针对癌症患者的机器人基因组测试设施启动皇家马斯登 NHS 基金会信托基金与 Automata Technologies（一家为生命科学实验室自动化提供支持的领先自动化公司）合作后，英国首次使用机器人技术来支持癌症患者的基因组测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/UKe28099s-first-robotic-genomic-testing-facility-for-cancer-病人-launches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/UKe28099s-first-robotic-genomic-testing-facility-for-cancer-病人-launches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7937bb8-f8b1-407d-8842-bd4239f2c393 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 03:13:00 -0400 UK’s first robotic genomic testing facility for cancer patients launches
产品获奖者：医药/健康类别Automata 很高兴地宣布 LINQ 荣获产品类别的 iF 设计奖：医药/健康 (1.22)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Winner-in-the-product-Medicinehealth-category.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Winner-in-the-product-Medicinehealth-category.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01f210b5-355d-454e-89c0-64d896b4135b Fri, 06 Sep 2024 03:03:00 -0400 Winner in the product: Medicine/health category
研究发现光污染与阿尔茨海默病之间存在相关性在全球某些地方，灯光永远不会熄灭。路灯、道路照明和照明标志可以阻止犯罪，使道路更安全，并改善景观美化。然而，不间断的光照会带来生态、行为和健康方面的后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Study-finds-correlation- Between-light-pollution-and-Alzheimers-Disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Study-finds-correlation- Between-light-pollution-and-Alzheimers-Disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76339236-465d-4188-99b9-52c846f40c1b Fri, 06 Sep 2024 02:18:00 -0400 Study finds correlation between light pollution and Alzheimer's Disease
微重力对癌症发展和治疗的影响维克森林再生医学研究所 (WFIRM) 很荣幸地宣布选择在国际空间站 (ISS) 上进行一项开创性的癌症研究项目。该项目是国际空间站国家实验室与美国宇航局合作通过竞争性招标选出的仅有的五个项目之一，旨在探索微重力对癌症发展和治疗的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/The-impact-of-microgravity-on-cancer-development-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/The-impact-of-microgravity-on-cancer-development-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb7f442b-530e-481d-bd3d-d5cb937cffd7 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 02:08:25 -0400 The impact of microgravity on cancer development and treatment
关节炎药物可以逆转新冠肺炎肺损伤弗吉尼亚大学医学院和西达西奈分校的最新研究表明，已经可处方的关节炎药物有可能阻止新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 感染后持续数月或数年的肺部问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Arthritis-medications-could-reverse-COVID-lung-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Arthritis-medications-could-reverse-COVID-lung-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=494f18a7-8c94-44c4-ad95-4266b5bc0848 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 01:54:10 -0400 Arthritis medications could reverse COVID lung damage
欧洲突破性研究分析了发酵食品对健康的影响Review 使用系统方法评估发酵食品的健康益处和风险，为未来研究发酵食品在营养和公共卫生中的作用奠定基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Fermented-foods-health-impacts-analyzed-in-groundwriting-European-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Fermented-foods-health-impacts-analyzed-in-groundwriting-European-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74ec310a-1e2f-4ee7-b8c6-eca78a952bd3 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 01:48:00 -0400 Fermented foods' health impacts analyzed in groundbreaking European study
癌症药物为严重狼疮患者带来改变生活的结果柏林夏里特医学大学的团队对一名患有严重系统性红斑狼疮 (SLE) 的女性患者在接受癌症药物 teclistamab 治疗后的巨大改善感到惊讶。不久前，23岁的他因自身免疫性疾病只能坐在轮椅上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Cancer-drug-offers-life-changing-results-for-severe-lupus-patent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Cancer-drug-offers-life-changing-results-for-severe-lupus-patent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29daef44-c983-4535-8941-daef6172b269 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 01:40:02 -0400 Cancer drug offers life-changing results for severe lupus patient
FDA 将监管婴儿食品中的砷和镉大米和菠菜是婴儿和幼儿的主食，但这些食物中发现的有毒金属和类金属会对健康造成严重影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/FDA-set-to-regulate-arsenic-and-cadmium-in-baby-food.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/FDA-set-to-regulate-arsenic-and-cadmium-in-baby-food.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9edaa040-9ed4-4c0e-8732-094a0b4a4df5 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 01:36:30 -0400 FDA set to regulate arsenic and cadmium in baby food
